ygData.subject: Re: Rune I
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO, Berserker strength absorbs *almost* the same amount AND it gives 20 strength AND it is a free cast. I solely use Berserker Strength and it has saved me
ygData.messageBody:
IMO, Berserker strength absorbs *almost* the same amount AND it gives 20
strength AND it is a "free" cast. I solely use Berserker Strength and it has
saved me and many party members. I will usually cast it on the "puller" as
soon as he arrives, but before the monster, that way the others can taunt it
off or get some good damage in as soon as the monster arrives.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
